body_html:
@Yangqing Already the master branch of Caffe2.
When I do cmake and make install, I enter the virtual environment by source activate $ENV, then I am using the protoc in this environment. Before I enter the virtual environment, I check that the default protoc is /usr/bin/protoc, the version is 2.6.1.
Is it because the script finds the default protoc in the system instead of the one in my virtual environment? This is a public cluster and I don't have the sudo access, how should I solve the issue? Thanks.
